The Best Live Bands in the Sussex

Looking for a band for your party in Sussex? The music scene in Sussex and the South East of England is incredibly welcoming and supportive. We've put together a list of the other bands for hire from our local area that we admire - if you see any of these names on the bill, you should changes your plans and head to see them.

We've put together an up-to-date list of the top Sussex Party Bands to book in 2020.

The Great Fire

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • YouTube
  • Website

Our foot-stomping electric live act is full of infectious, sing-along songs and highly dance-able tunes from the last five decades - guaranteed to get you on the dancefloor.

We've carefully curated a list of songs from over five decades of music. These aren't your standard cover band songs; while we love playing cover band classics and crowd pleasers, you're equally likely to find us playing something that's currently on the radio.

  • Book Now
  • About the band

Joel White

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Website

Joel White is dynamic, musical and entertaining in equal measure. Soul, Blues, Jazz and Funk are the languages he most fluently speaks.

If you want original funk, soul or blues with a twist which will get everyone dancing, then look no further. Whether you are looking for an acoustic intimate set or a full band, Joel can set the tone just right.

  • Visit Website

Stacey & John

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Website

Stacey & John are an accomplished acoustic duo with an eclectic repertoire of over than two and a half hours of covers, from soulful oldies to contemporary classics.

Whether you want a party or mellow background music, they can tailor their set to suit your needs.

  • Visit Website

The Normans

  • Facebook

The Normans are a 4-piece party tunes cover band based in the South East of England (Eastbourne and Folkestone). Always performing with infectious enthusiasm, they play well-known pop, dance, rock and indie songs from some of history's greatest and most well loved artists.

The Criminal Records

  • Facebook

Five piece Sussex-based covers band playing the best of funk, soul and rock.

Probably the most fun and the most musically daring covers band in the South! Let your hair down and join in the fun...

The Diamond Experience

  • Facebook
  • Facebook

Fronted by Joel White, The Diamond Experience provide bespoke musical solutions for all events, weddings and private hires. Perhaps the most versatile collective of musicians we've ever worked with.

  • Visit Website

The Cavaliers

  • Facebook

Playing to some of the largest audiences in the South, are these the local cover band to beat?

When Does Party Season Begin?

In Sussex, the party season is year-round. Throughout the Summer (when the weather is more... predictable) you'll find us playing beer gardens, BBQs and or one of the many beach-front venues in Eastbourne, Hastings or Brighton.

As the nights draw in, you'll find us playing in pubs and bars across sussex - preferably those with an open log fire.
